text: Ni Rabbow anu diggah yi samadak tu dabqah daqaaray buqre sinnil hee, ku qariy caram deqsitah xaqul, Ni Rabbow salat elle faxxiima innal abaanaah soolisaanankeh, toysa sinaamak lubbitte ken takcineeh, maxhaxah keen√Æ fanah kelittam keenih ab, maggo afah yan caxammixu rizqhik keenih acuy, ku niqmatal koo faatita mara yakkeeninkeh
